content: Swipe to close Thunderbird does not always work.

title: K9-mail or Thunderbird no longer automatically check mails at scheduled time
creator: ciroettorre
content: both k9-mail and Thunderbirds no longer check mails at scheduled time ( i.e. every 30 minutes ) on my Galaxy S24+ 512gb Android phone. Its something happened in one of the lasr One UI or App updates but I don't know when. Thunderbird is a scratch new installation, with parameters imported from previous k9-mail installation. I tried to set/reset some synch parameters but without success. All Apps have/had full notification permissions. Please help
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/138.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36;os:Android

title: Thunderbird 11.0 for android does not exit on back gesture
creator: rafnov
content: I can't exit from Thunderbird 11.0 for Android with a swipe back gesture anymore. Realme GT Neo2, Android 13. On another Realme 7 Pro Android 12 it works five. How to fix?

title: Android drop down menu for folders
creator: L8mith1
content: I don't like the drop down menus. I want them expanded all the time

title: image inserted on the fly
creator: andy.concilio
content: hello. i just tried Thunderbird for Android and I love it except for one thing. when I compose a new email, often times, I need to insert an image. MS Outlook, allows us to do that on the fly but it appears that TB does not have this feature yet. will it be adding down the line?
